history.content:
Hey y'all!

Free Ventures is recruiting for our internal team! Free Ventures is UC Berkeley's leading pre-seed startup accelerator, crafting highly individualized paths for founders across industries and academic backgrounds in a 3-month program 🚀

 

As the university's only nonprofit accelerator program run by students, internal team members receive an unparalleled exposure to Berkeley's leading startups through the process of selecting founders, operating the accelerator, and managing portfolio companies and partner relations. We spend our full time helping our companies with product, fundraising, marketing, and more while curating a support network of top venture capitalists, resource partners, founders, and thought leaders from the Valley. 

 

In doing so, we have helped our 62 alumni teams — ranging from undergrads to MBAs and PhDs — raise over $55 million from top firms such as Y Combinator, Greylock, Kleiner Perkins, and Accel. Collectively they’ve gone on to tackle problems in Neuroscience, Drones, IoT, VR, AI/ML, Blockchain, Bioengineering, FinTech, and Renewable Energy, to name a few.

 

If you're interested in empowering talented Berkeley students to keep building and creating, we'd love to meet you! Come out to our infosession on Tuesday, October 20th (https://www.facebook.com/events/871131273419831/) and apply at http://www.freeventures.org/apply/ by midnight Friday, 10/23

Feel free to email adhiv@freeventures.org or nikita@freeventures.org if you have any questions!
history.subject: Join Berkeley's leading startup accelerator's internal team
